pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DatatypesI've been creating the same types of classes over and over and I finally want to collect these classes into a central location that I can pull into multiple projects.## InstallationInstall latest stable with the following command. $ pip install datatypes Or install the latest and greatest from source: $ pip install -U "git+https://github.com/jaymon/datatypes#egg=datatypes"
